dialogueSection.text: Boss: Sully, I need you to volunteer for early retirement...
Sully: ...and why the hell would I do that?
Boss: I've been getting reports of you roughing up civillians, fighting with other officers and getting drunk on the job.
Sully: Spare me the lecture would you.
Boss: Look I don't want to see you go, you're one of my best guys.
Boss: But ever since Mary died you've been getting reckless and you're making the department look bad.
Sully: I don't give a damn about how the department looks! I'm trying to stop a goddamn killer.
Boss: You're on a revenge mission and you have to stop this...
Sully: ...What I need, is to find the bastard who did this!
Boss: Look I get it, you couldn't solve her murder and it's killing you.
Boss: But dammit man you have to let this go!
Sully: I'm not going to drop this and you know it.
Sully: So why don't you save us both the time and fire me?!
Boss: Goddammit Sully don't make me do this!
Sully: Either fire me or get out of my damn way!
Boss: That's it! Hand in your gun and badge.
Sully: To hell with you! I don't need your damn badge!
Sully: I'll solve this on my own.
